scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm -C backend dev" "pnpm -C frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @app/shared build && pnpm --filter ./frontend build && pnpm --filter ./backend build
scripts.build:railway: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:verify
scripts.start:local: pnpm run build && pnpm run start
scripts.dev:prod: pnpm run build && NODE_ENV=production pnpm run start
